    • Method Detail

      • incrementalMount

        public TestComponentTree.Builder incrementalMount(boolean isEnabled)
        Description copied from class: ComponentTree.Builder
        Whether or not to enable the incremental mount optimization. True by default.

        IMPORTANT: if you set this to false, visibility events will not fire.

        Overrides:
        incrementalMount in class ComponentTree.Builder

      • layoutDiffing

        public TestComponentTree.Builder layoutDiffing(boolean enabled)
        Description copied from class: ComponentTree.Builder
        Whether or not to enable layout tree diffing. This will reduce the cost of updates at the expense of using extra memory. True by default.
        Overrides:
        layoutDiffing in class ComponentTree.Builder

      • layoutThreadLooper

        public TestComponentTree.Builder layoutThreadLooper(Looper looper)
        Description copied from class: ComponentTree.Builder
        Specify the looper to use for running layouts on. Note that in rare cases layout must run on the UI thread. For example, if you rotate the screen, we must measure on the UI thread. If you don't specify a Looper here, the Components default Looper will be used.
        Overrides:
        layoutThreadLooper in class ComponentTree.Builder
